mapper.sql: id, source_blog_domain_name as sourceBlogDomainName, target_blog_domain_name as targetBlogDomainName, path_length as pathLength, ip_address as ipAddress, searched_at as searchedAt
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT source_blog_domain_name, target_blog_domain_name, max(path_length) as path_length, max(ip_address) as ip_address, max(searched_at) as searched_at FROM blog_intimacy_search_history GROUP BY source_blog_domain_name, target_blog_domain_name ORDER BY source_blog_domain_name, target_blog_domain_name, max(searched_at) DESC ) t ORDER BY t.searched_at DESC LIMIT #{size}
